name: Nandeyanen!? - The 1st Sûtra
description: Nandeyanen!? – The 1st Sûtra is a horizontal 2D shoot’em up that introduces gameplay mechanics such as bullet counter and blast pods. The player takes the role of Tenguman, a long-nosed goblin who wakes up after a thousand year sleep to see the world overrun by an army of mythical pranksters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 capable GPU with PS3.0+ support DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: XInput compatible gamepad or even better, an arcade stick
